remarks: A Hilbert space is a complete complex pre-Hilbert space over ` RR ` or ` CC ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
statement:
hlress.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
hlress.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
ishl2 $p |- ( W e. CHil <-> ( W e. CMetSp /\ W e. CPreHil /\ K e. { RR , CC } ) ) $.
